hero.title: PIXEL CARDS, INFINITE TACTICS
hero.subtitle: Collect ancient spirits, forge your deck, and conquer the Wooden Realm in the ultimate retro-modern card battle experience.

chronicles.title: THE ANCIENT CHRONICLES
chronicles.subtitle: Volume I: The Sprouting Era
chronicles.history: Before the age of the Great Drought, the forest was a sanctuary of infinite mana. The scrolls speak of the First Strikeâ€”a card battle that lasted seven moons and shaped the very roots of our world.

footer.motto: PIXELS BY HAND. TACTICS BY COLD LOGIC.
